context: Global pharmaceutical company, 15000 employees, evaluating major investment in gene therapy platform for rare diseases

request.purpose: Build integrated gene therapy platform including R&D, manufacturing, and commercialization capabilities
request.justification: Gene therapy represents transformative opportunity in rare disease treatment with $50B+ market potential and first-mover advantage

decision_process.outcome: Confirmed strong strategic fit with significant market opportunity
Technology validated with manageable risks and strong IP position
Projected 15% IRR with break-even in 7 years
Clear regulatory pathway with accelerated approval potential
Approved with phased investment approach and key performance milestones

business_impact.financial_impact: Expected $2B revenue contribution by 2030 with significant R&D tax credits
business_impact.market_position: First-mover advantage in gene therapy with potential for 15% market share
business_impact.capability_building: Advanced genomic medicine capabilities and specialized manufacturing expertise

decision_outcome: Approved $750M investment with phased rollout: $300M initial platform development, $250M clinical programs, $200M manufacturing capabilities; additional $50M allocated for regulatory and market access strategies
